title: Best of the Program | Guests: Jack Carr & Michael Malice | 7/29/22
description:
Glenn dives further into his critique of CNN's claim that an "imposter Christianity" consisting of "white Christian nationalists" is plaguing America. Author Michael Malice shares his thoughts on progressives pushing the woke term "Filipinx" and the latest Big Tech attacks on free speech. Author and executive producer of "The Terminal List" Jack Carr reveals how the Amazon Prime adaption came about and the inspiration behind the Deep State plotline.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
